name: TekSkeleton
description:
TekSkeleton this is a hardcore 2D platformer with 5 hand-crafted levels wrapped in atmospheric retro dungeon-style graphics. This is the debut game of the Tek line games.

Features!
  • Spirit of retro games
  • Stylish dungeon theme
  • Linear progression of levels
  • 5 difficult handmade levels
  • Convenient and sensitive control
  • Automatic level restart after loss
